I am what parents fear their children may be exposed to.
I am what becomes of the abused, the ignored, and the used.
I am the star burnt to black.
I am the heart forever extinguished.
I am the user who has been used.
I am the wisdom left unheard.
I am the emotion left unfelt.
I am what will go wrong.

I am the first love, torn and forgotten.
I am the confusion you felt inside.
I am the destiny that has changed.
I am the fates unconsidered.

I am the longing for the aborted.
I am the unexperienced existance.
I am the disbelief you feel inside.

I am the temptress, I am the whore.

I am the shame of the raped.
I am the thrill of the abuser.
I am the guilt of the adultress.
I am the bruises left by the sadist.
I am the pleasure felt by the masochist.
I am the loneliness in the crowd.
I am the dark inside the cave.
I am the fear that paralizes.
I am the secret futilely hidden.
I am The mistake you hide in terror.
I am the whisper you hear in the dark.
I am the desperation of a dying sinner.
I am the nightmare from which you cannot wake.
I am the heart, forever closed and black.
I am the obsession of the stalker.
I am the friend who abandoned.
I am the dreams left undone.
I am the voices left unsung.
I am the logic that faltered.
I am the disreguarded and
I am alone.
I am
the hatred of thyself,
desired left unabtained,
the song left unfinished,
the false intimacy once felt,
the departed who can never return,
the innocent condemned to die,
the thought that consumed you,
the mood forever swinging,
the control seeping back,
LOVE UNREQUITED
I am dark
I am
--Pi--
